meta.name: description
meta.content: Paragon Science Academy is an A-rated STEM school in Chandler, Phoenix AZ. We prepare students for college and beyond with an emphasis on Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math in our elementary, middle, and high school

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Paragon Science Academy, high school, middle school, elementary school, Phoenix school, private school, basis, academy, charter school, STEM, Chandler
